In childhood I was active and very mobile and had many fights and brawls with my friends
In childhood I was constantly punished for too much mischief and adults saw me as a troublemaker
In adolescence I was interested in active activities (like football, fencing, weapons, wrestling) and got into many fights
In childhood and adolescence I constantly returned home with wounds on my body and head
I usually become the shield for my friends
Others can easily provoke me to do something they want and put the consequences on me
Constant work planning is difficult and sometimes I take risks without thinking that damage my work and income
It often happens that I act first, then think later, and many times I blame myself for this
I like working in a group and friendly way
I've done things for others many times that had no benefit for me
My friends have a very important place in my life and in friendship I easily put my life and money on the line
If someone disrespects members of my family, even if I'm angry with them, I get very agitated and defend
I love sports and physical activities and when I jump around so much that I'm drenched in sweat, I enjoy it
Following orders and rules is difficult for me and I can't last in a bureaucracy and paperwork system
It often happens to me that I unconsciously come to myself and notice my fist is clenched or my muscles are tense
I really like touching others and hugging others
I'm interested in dance and am a good dancer
When sleeping I pass out from fatigue of too much physical activity and wake up in the morning again with a lot of energy
I'm an emotional person and easily express my feelings
I've fallen in love many times
I married without planning
In marital relationship I can be physically absorbed in the relationship and enjoy it
If a woman attracts me, her age doesn't matter to me
I spend a lot of time with children and want my children to always be around me, I wrestle with them and create physical relationships
Others see me as a simple and unpretentious person and believe I'm a little boy who has grown tall
